titles.title: A bill to amend section 127 of title 23, United States Code (relating to vehicle weight), to permit the operation of vehicles in the State of Nebraska which could be lawfully operated within such State on May 1, 1982.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to vehicle weight limitations on the Interstate system to permit the operation of vehicles in the State of Nebraska which could be legally operated in such State on May 1, 1982.
